generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and curbs, which is designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, separated by curbs and bordered by trees and fences.
- building: A large stone building is visible on the right side of the image.
- fence: Metal railings are present along the sidewalk on both sides of the road.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are mounted on poles along the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along the road and sidewalks.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in the background and along the edges of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A black car is visible in the middle of the road, and a blue car is parked on the left side.
- train: A modern tram is visible on the tracks on the right side of the image.
